sections.title: Ability Scores Overview
sections.description: Introduction to the six ability scores, their ranges, and how they affect character attributes

sections.title: Generating Ability Scores
sections.description: All methods for generating ability scores including dice rolling, point buy, and racial modifiers. Includes ability modifier calculation

sections.title: Abilities and Spellcasters
sections.description: How ability scores affect spellcasting, bonus spells, and minimum scores needed to cast spells for different classes

sections.title: Strength (Str)
sections.description: Complete rules for Strength including what it affects, temporary/permanent bonuses, ability damage, carrying capacity, and descriptive examples

sections.title: Dexterity (Dex)
sections.description: Complete rules for Dexterity including ranged attacks, AC, reflex saves, skills, temporary/permanent bonuses, and ability damage

sections.title: Constitution (Con)
sections.description: Complete rules for Constitution including hit points, fortitude saves, undead/construct special rules, temporary/permanent bonuses, and ability damage

sections.title: Intelligence (Int)
sections.description: Complete rules for Intelligence including skill points, languages, wizard spells, special creature type rules, temporary/permanent bonuses, and ability damage

sections.title: Wisdom (Wis)
sections.description: Complete rules for Wisdom including will saves, perception, divine spellcasting, temporary/permanent bonuses, and ability damage

sections.title: Charisma (Cha)
sections.description: Complete rules for Charisma including social skills, channel energy, spontaneous spellcasting, undead life force, temporary/permanent bonuses, and ability damage

sections.title: Ability Score Bonuses
sections.description: Rules for temporary and permanent ability score increases, including duration effects and what bonuses apply

sections.title: Ability Score Damage
sections.description: Complete rules for ability score damage including penalties, unconsciousness, death conditions, and healing

sections.title: Ability Score Penalties and Drain
sections.description: Rules for temporary ability penalties and permanent ability drain, including differences from ability damage
